answers.answer: It could be dehydration, low iron, hypertension, diabetes, or preeclampsia. I would take a trip to the doctor. Or ER.You need to take a daily prenatal vitamin If you haven't been.Drink at least 64ozs of water that's 4 16oz bottles. More If you can 5 or 6 would be better.With your symptoms it's best to seek medical attention quickly. I know dizziness while pregnancy is usually normal but fainting isn't a good sign. Just get checked out and keep us updated.  I will be praying everything is OK.

question: It is normal to feel dizzy or fainting for three day? I don't like to feel that what can I do or is something wrong
title: 3 days with dizzy symptoms is that normal?
